name: Worldest D izzy Game
description:
It's a simple game where you can destroy bullets flying from a cannon at the right time,
but this game will be dizzy among all the games you have experienced.

There are a total of five kinds of bulllets.
The first is an ordinary bulllet that only moves in a straight line.
The second is a bulllet that moves in a straight line and then bends 90 degrees and then moves in a straight line again.
The third is a bulllet that flies faster than other bulllets.
The fourth is a bullet that moves in a straight line, stops for a few seconds, and then moves in a straight line again.
The fifth bullet is a bulllet that bends and moves like a snail's nest.

Below is an introduction to the game functions.

Main Menu


Start
You can start the game as click the start button.

Option
We have a option for you. As soon as you turn on the game, it may be dizzy.
You can turn off dizzy mode in the option. (But not recommend)
You can also change the game control key.

Quit
You can exit the game as click the quit button.

Menu


Mode

Stage Mode
We have creative and a lot of stages that you can enjoy.
You can get the stars, if you achieve a certain score.
The acquisition conditions of the stars, you can check out in the game.

Infinity Mode
We have infinity mode that stimulates the desire for challenge.
Infinity mode is literally endless and you can continue to challenge yourself.


Character
We have characters that each one has his or her own ability.
If you get 18 stars in Stage mode, you get one key to unlock the character.

Tutorial
We have tutorial which will help you a lot in getting to know the game.
If you haven't fully understood the game with just one tutorial, you can always play it again.

Shop
We also have a shop where you can decorate the characters.
You can buy awesome cap, or some else.

This game was developed by students of Games, a game development club at Korea Digital Media High School
